articles.author: Sawdah Bhaimiya
articles.title: Spain becomes first country in Europe to ban social media for under-16s - CNBC
articles.description: Spain's Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez urges the protection of children from a "digital wild west."
articles.content:
A 13-year-old boy poses at his home as he looks at social media on his mobile phone in Sydney on December 8, 2025. (Photo by Saeed KHAN / AFP via Getty Images)
Spain announced plans on Tuesday to in… [+4351 chars]
